CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?
CTR.A: This chart is a {stacked area chart}.

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stacked area chart?

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total user engagement rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Mobile Users}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total user engagement rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Mobile Users}.

VE.Q: What is Mobile Users's User Engagement Rate in 2004?
VE.A: Mobile Users's user engagement rate in 2004 is {14.86} %.

VE.Q: What is Mobile Users's User Engagement Rate in 1976?
VE.A: Mobile Users's user engagement rate in 1976 is {25.67} %.

VE.Q: What is Mobile Users's User Engagement Rate in 1989?
VE.A: Mobile Users's user engagement rate in 1989 is {11.34} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum total User Engagement Rate in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum total user engagement rate is {10.38} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum total User Engagement Rate in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum total user engagement rate is {25.94} %.

SC.Q: What is the average height of Mobile Users's User Engagement Rate area?
SC.A: The average height of Mobile Users's user engagement rate area is {19.81} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total User Engagement Rate go below 18 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {15.34} % in {1994}, total value was {16.24} % in {1988}, total value was {14.86} % in {2004}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total User Engagement Rate fall between 19 and 21 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {20.27} % in {2000}, total value was {20.45} % in {1987}, total value was {20.58} % in {1985}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total User Engagement Rate exceed 22 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {22.32} % in {1991}, total value was {25.53} % in {2001}, total value was {22.38} % in {1997}.

NC.Q: Between 1979 and 1987, did the total User Engagement Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1977 and 1982?
NC.A: The change in total user engagement rate between {1979} and {1987} was {larger} than between {1977} and {1982}.

NC.Q: Was the total User Engagement Rate in 1985 higher or lower than in 1995?
NC.A: The total user engagement rate in {1985} was {lower} than in {1995}.

NC.Q: Was the total User Engagement Rate in 1986 higher or lower than in 2003?
NC.A: The total user engagement rate in {1986} was {higher} than in {2003}.

NC.Q: Between 1987 and 2001, did the total User Engagement Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1985 and 1988?
NC.A: The change in total user engagement rate between {1987} and {2001} was {larger} than between {1985} and {1988}.
